name: Spark-Md v1.0
description: Deploy your own Spark-Md bot.Fill in your valuables.

PREFIX.description: insert a prefix for your bot, be it a letter, a number or a symbol

AUTO_VIEW_STATUS.description: Your contact status will be read automatically(type on to activate this feature or type off to deactivate it ; don't write in capital letters)

AUTO_SAVE_STATUS.description: Your contact status will download automatically and send to you(insert on to activate or off to deactivate ; don't write in capital letters)

PM_PERMIT.description: Other users can't use your bot in pm (type on to activate this feature or type off to deactivate it ; don't write in capital letters)

BOT_NAME.description: put A name for your bot

BOT_MENU_LINKS.description: add one or many link for your bot menu  ; eg : url1,url2,url3.....

MODE.description: type public to put your bot on public mode or private to put it on private mode

HEROKU_APY_KEY.description: insert your heroku api-key (THIS IS A MUST )

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: insert your heroku APP NAME (this is optionnal)

SESSION_ID.description: put your session ID , make sure it starts with eyjub

WARN_COUNT.desc: this is the limit of warn for warning commandes

STARTING_BOT_MESSAGE.description: if you don't want starting-bot-message put no else put yes

PRESENCE.description: Put online to indicate that you are ever online even if you are not. Put typing to indicate that you are currently typing a message. Put recording to indicate that you are currently recording an audio. Or leave the field blank to indicate your real state.

ANTI_DELETE_MESSAGE.description: type on if you want antidelete on or type off if you don't want this feature
